name: The Space Potato
description:
A Game For Trijam #175: The 3 hour long game jam

You play as a Space Potato trying to get to Earth from Mars, On your way you encounter asteroids and some spoons? This is an endless shooter, the game is a little buggy and unbalanced but this was made in 3 hours so don't expect too much!

Controls -

W S - Move your potato up and down

Aim using your mouse and left-click to shoot.

Your Goal is to earn as much score as you can! But don't let the asteroids hit you!

You can also get powerups from the mini-bosses!
